content:
Today I chose PR 5361 for discussion!

feat(analysis/real/polynomial): preparations for Liouville
Created by @Jujian Zhang (@jjaassoonn) on 2020-12-14
Labels: WIP

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
I have been making progress on simplifying the arguments and streamlining the proofs. I have been already adding some lemmas to mathlib, precisely with this goal in mind!
